note: Primal play, breeding kink, objectification, tears, chastity, special psychological kinks

scenes.generation_prompt: forest or large house setting, he chasing her, she running looking back with excited fear, primal hunt dynamic, predator and prey game, catching her from behind, animalistic energy, raw pursuit

user_description.en: She runs, he chases. Primal hunt through the house or woods. When he catches her, she's his prey. Animal instincts unleashed.
user_description.ru: Она бежит, он преследует. Первобытная охота через дом или лес. Когда он поймает её, она его добыча. Животные инстинкты выпущены.

ai_context.description: Primal play - chase/hunt dynamic. Tests: predator/prey, animalistic sex, rawness, pursuit.

question_angles.as_prey: Does being chased and caught excite you?
question_angles.as_predator: Do you enjoy the hunt dynamic?
question_angles.primal: Does tapping into animal instincts appeal?

taboo_context.normalization: Primal play taps into deep instincts—safewords essential, space to play needed

scenes.generation_prompt: intense sex moment, he growling in her ear, low animal sounds, biting her neck like claiming, raw primal energy, she responding to his animalistic nature, bedroom or floor, completely unleashed

user_description.en: He growls in her ear, bites her neck like an animal claiming mate. Human civility gone, pure primal energy released.
user_description.ru: Он рычит ей в ухо, кусает шею как животное метящее пару. Человеческая цивилизованность ушла, чистая первобытная энергия выпущена.

ai_context.description: Primal sounds and biting - growling, animal noises, neck biting. Tests: animalistic expression, sound.

question_angles.reaction: Does growling during sex turn you on?

taboo_context.normalization: Animal sounds during sex are natural—dropping inhibitions

scenes.generation_prompt: intense penetration moment, he pressing deep inside her, both knowing no protection, breeding talk implied, raw primal desire to impregnate, she receiving with acceptance of biological purpose, intimate bedroom

user_description.en: Deep inside her, no barriers. The primal urge to breed, to fill her, to make her his completely. Biological imperative as kink.

ai_context.description: Breeding kink - desire to impregnate/be impregnated as arousal. Separate from actually wanting children.

question_angles.fantasy_vs_reality: Does breeding TALK turn you on regardless of actually wanting kids?

scenes.generation_prompt: BDSM setting, she on all fours being used as furniture, he placing drink on her back, she still and silent serving as object, dehumanization as kink, her acceptance of object role, dark intimate setting

user_description.en: She becomes furniture—a table for his drink. Not a person in this moment, just an object to be used. Dehumanization as devotion.

ai_context.description: Objectification - being treated as object/furniture. Dehumanization kink. Tests: being used as thing, losing personhood temporarily.

question_angles.as_object: Would being treated as furniture/object appeal?

negative: need to be seen as human

scenes.generation_prompt: intimate intense moment, she crying from intensity of pleasure or overwhelm, tears streaming but expression is ecstasy not pain, he tenderly wiping her tears while continuing, emotional release through sex, overwhelming sensation
